name: Mini jam 84: Bubbles
description:
Small game maded in 72 hours for Mini Jam #84

Jam theme: Bubbles!
Jam limitation: You are your own ammo.

Used assets:

  •  Luis Zuno @ansimuz -Tileset & texture pack
  • Pzuh - button sprites
  • Cassala - bubble sprites
  • GameDeveloperStudio - face sprites
  • IndieGameMusic.com - background music
  • Avaruusnuija - sound effects
